actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to guarantee loans of $100 million to railroad systems in the Midwestern United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to guarantee loans of $100,000,000 to railroad systems in the Midwestern United States upon obtaining satisfactory assurances that: (1) the loans will be repaid within 15 years, (2) that no more than $9,100,000 of any loan will be used to meet operating expenses; and (3) that the remainder of guaranteed funds will be applied to the maintenance of property. Authorizes appropriations to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to guarantee loans of $100 million to railroad systems in the Midwestern United States.
